recipe_name: Caramelised oranges with amaretti and cream
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Heat the butter and sugar together in a small frying pan until the sugar has dissolved. Add the sliced oranges and cook for 2-3 minutes, until they are coated and caramelised. Add the brandy and carefully allow to flame.  When the flames have died out, remove from the heat and arrange the orange slices around a shallow serving dish. Pour the sauce from the frying pan over the oranges. Sprinkle over the crushed biscuits, grated chocolate and garnish with a sprig of mint.   To serve, drizzle over some double cream.
